text: Gen AI is a transformative technology
that all software companies need to adapt
and adopt in their processes.
We're really, really bullish on AI.

We use AI both internally
to make our employees more

effective and efficient,
to deliver better value,
but we also build AI into our product.

And our first foray into
using AI has been in the sort
of text analysis space,

and that's where our customers
can get actionable insights
that matter, to make better product
and usability decisions.
It allows our customers
to take action on the problems
which they are keen to solve.

The first generative AI
end user case that we
sort-of tackled was around text analytics.
We collect millions
and millions of open-ended text
questions every single month.
We have 186 million users on our platform,
and each one of those submits text
to our platform on a regular basis.

We needed to be able
to extract insight from
that text analysis,

and in order to do that,
we used the generative AI
and we used the summarization
and topic generation from that
to deliver a much better user experience.

Alida has worked with a
number of different AI
and ML solutions in the past,
and the cost to building our own model
and building our own AI internally
was a bit cost prohibitive

and also a very, very difficult
thing for us to invest in
because we had to train the model on each
of our customer's data sets.

Amazon Bedrock gave us
multiple foundational models

which we could use, and the
those foundational models

allowed us to sort of
approach different problems.

And so one problem that we
have is summarizing text.

Another problem that we
have is image generation.
And so the flexibility of models
was sort-of number one reason.

Amazon Bedrock allows their
data to be their own data,

and not shared with any
of the model providers.

We selected the Anthropic
Claude model from Amazon Bedrock
because of its training data

and also the ethical AI
story that they have.

Now, we needed that sort of
contextual awareness

that generative AI gives
in a large language model,

and in order to deliver
that generative AI,

specifically Anthropic Claude
is a really, really good model

for us to take and tackle
some of the first problems

that we needed to
approach in our business.

What's really unique about
the solution that we delivered

with Amazon Bedrock is the fact
that we don't need context.

And so we no longer
need to train our model
for every individual customer use case.

This enables us to deliver a
much better experience at a
much lower price.

Amazon Bedrock provides a ton
of value back to Alida.
It enables our customers
to get insights faster with less work.
They have a limited amount of time,
they have a limited amount of energy,

and as such, Amazon Bedrock
gets those insights faster

by delivering them in
a more actionable way.
